July 11, 1931 D Fairford Contest (Section 1)
Fairford Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Fairford Contest fairford-contest-section-1

The Mastersingers (Die Meistersinger)
Fairford, Gloucestershire, England, UK Prizes 1st £26.10s.0d. and cup, 2nd £13.10s.0d. 3rd £6. Best horn, trombone and euphonium - Rothwell Temperance, best cornet - Hanwell. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2012, 4:36 p.m. Dec. 15, 2018, 10:10 p.m.
1 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Nathan Sidebottom
2 Morris Motors Band Sydney Wood
3 Hanwell Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
Unknown Result Aldbourne Band Joe Alder
